trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Overdrive Books | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Overdrive Books | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Overdrive Books with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Overdrive Books with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and OverDrive.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and OverDrive.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: An OverDrive single sign-on enabled subscription
trans-unit.target: An OverDrive single sign-on enabled subscription

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to OverDrive will be able to single sign into the application at your OverDrive company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to OverDrive will be able to single sign into the application at your OverDrive company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for OverDrive
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for OverDrive

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for OverDrive.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for OverDrive.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>

trans-unit.source: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Applications</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Applications</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Add at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Add at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add application</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add application</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.
trans-unit.target: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the search box, type OverDrive.
trans-unit.target: In the search box, type OverDrive.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Application Gallery</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Application Gallery</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select OverDrive, and then click Complete to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select OverDrive, and then click Complete to add the application.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>OverDrive</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>OverDrive</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to OverDrive with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to OverDrive with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the OverDrive application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the OverDrive application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Enable single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Enable single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the How would you like users to sign on to OverDrive page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the How would you like users to sign on to OverDrive page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure App URL page, in the OverDrive Sign In URL textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "http://mslibrarytest.libraryreserve.com", and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure App URL page, in the OverDrive Sign In URL textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "http://mslibrarytest.libraryreserve.com", and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure single sign-on at OverDrive page, to download the metadata file, and then send it to the OverDrive support team.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure single sign-on at OverDrive page, to download the metadata file, and then send it to the OverDrive support team.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The OverDrive support team configures single sign-on for you and sends you a notification when the configuration has been completed.
trans-unit.target: The OverDrive support team configures single sign-on for you and sends you a notification when the configuration has been completed.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: There is no action item for you to configure user provisioning to OverDrive.
trans-unit.target: There is no action item for you to configure user provisioning to OverDrive.

trans-unit.source: When an assigned user tries to log into OverDrive, an OverDrive account is automatically created if necessary.
trans-unit.target: When an assigned user tries to log into OverDrive, an OverDrive account is automatically created if necessary.

trans-unit.source: You can use any other OverDrive user account creation tools or APIs provided by OverDrive to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: You can use any other OverDrive user account creation tools or APIs provided by OverDrive to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the OverDrive **application integration page, click **Assign users.
trans-unit.target: On the OverDrive **application integration page, click **Assign users.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Assign Users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Assign Users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Yes</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Yes</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
